subject: Order cancelation.
description_text:
Hi can I cancel this order? I'd like to replace the order with the base
plate.

conversations.body_text:
I attached a screenshot of the correct part id like. I'd like to be able to
still use that discount code.

On Tue, Aug 5, 2025, 6:07 PM General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> Hello, we can modify your order for you, please let me know the product
> model and specifications you want.
>
>
>
> ----------Reply to Message----------
>
Hi Justin Guerra,    Okay, we have already notified our warehouse to change your order. You can click on the link to pay the difference.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2

Ok great thank you i just paid the difference.

On Tue, Aug 5, 2025, 8:08 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Justin Guerra,         Okay, we have shipped Plus X P3-H3/Black/with Baseplate from our warehouse in the United States.

Awesome thank you. I didn just get a confirmation that the order if fully
fulfilled. How ever its still showing thw regular plus pedals and not the
plus x. Does that email portion for the order not update? I just want to
make sure the right pedals get sent.

On Wed, Aug 6, 2025, 2:34 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Justin Guerra,    Please don't worry, the backend page will not change, but the goods sent to you from our warehouse are correct.

Awesome much appreciated! Than you!

On Wed, Aug 6, 2025, 2:42 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi is there any way to get the discount code on the linear 3 pack haptics
pack?
